product.title: Cotswold Jewel - Roman Blind
product.description: A wonderfully contemporary take on classic floral patterning, the cotswold jewel offers a stunning array of pretty blossoms and foliage in gorgeous shades of rose pink, apple green, sky blue, and lemon yellow. The indigo grey background makes these pastel tones stand out beautifully. Give the jewel pride of place in the kitchen, where using pastel shades throughout will add a prettily contemporary look.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold pebble grey is the epitome of modern style blended in perfect harmony with a classic look. The finely poised slats sit proudly in your window space whilst the contemporary pebble grey takes pride of place in even the most modern home. Adding smaller features to the living room like a side lamp and coasters in pebble grey is a great way to create a subtle secondary layer to your decor. Keep the main colours to rich creams and lightly coloured woods and you'll see your favourite new colour really come to the fore.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy hue of cotswold monroe bisque is the perfect backdrop you need to create the relaxing and homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave. With a gentle colour that adorns every finely cut slat you'll be able to put your feet up with the peace of mind that you can rest without being disturbed. We love the idea of pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug on a lightly stained floor or a modern laminate floor.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ghost White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Soft Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece. The major appeal though is in the fabric itself, a tactile and soft weave that you'll almost want to wrap around yourself and the lightness of the grey in this fabric is a versatile, neutral look that's a dream for both modern homes and rustic schemes, so it's a versatile piece.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Ebony - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Grey Wash Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Bring your interiors together with ease with the lovely lumiere bijou linen grey wash roman blind. Its the perfect, modern neutral and can be easily styled with a range of rooms, from the bright and bold to monochrome schemes. The unlined fabric allows the light to softly s bring your interiors together with ease with the lovely lumiere bijou linen grey wash roman blind.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Pear Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Give your favourite space a little refresh with the uplifting lumiere unlined bijou linen pear roman blind. Full of energy, this green roman blind will bring the outside in and combined with the subtle textured finish, it will breathe a new life into surrounding decor. Pl give your favourite space a little refresh with the uplifting lumiere unlined bijou linen pear roman blind.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Grape Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A deep, luxurious red that effortlessly brings a glamorous vibe to interiors, the ombre bijou grape roman blind is truly captivating. Theres a lot to love about the stunning red roman blind, with the rich colour, textured finished and unlined fabric, it will complement a sche a deep, luxurious red that effortlessly brings a glamorous vibe to interiors, the ombre bijou grape roman blind is truly captivating.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Duck Egg Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Fresh, calming and of course, stylish too, the lumiere bijou linen duck egg roman blind brings a touch of calm to interiors. The tranquil bluey green shade is perfect for spaces that need a soft touch of colour and is so easy to style with other schemes, from the bright and bo fresh, calming and of course, stylish too, the lumiere bijou linen duck egg roman blind brings a touch of calm to interiors.

relproducts.title: Santiago Cotton Natural Cream Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Their santiago cotton roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This nautral cream cottonroman blind, introduces a dark cream/light brown shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Flannel Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: We love how sublimely soft and comfortingly traditional this touchy-feely fabric is, although we love the super trendy grey shade too. The softness of the fabric can't be overstated, a traditional-style weave that's homely and inviting. The contemporary shade balances that softne we love how sublimely soft and comfortingly traditional this touchy-feely fabric is, although we love the super trendy grey shade too.

relproducts.title: Cotswold Jade - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The cotswold in jade is perfectly named, with the pretty florals particularly reminiscent of gorgeous countryside. This beautiful roman blind mixes a canvas of predominantly green tones with pink-toned mauves and sunny yellows for a summery look all year round. Make the jade the star of the show in the living room, surrounding it with soft cream walls and matching shades of green and pink throughout the room.
